analysis.description: CardMakerCake.isContract (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol#385-388) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol:
	Contract CardMakerCake has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in CardMakerCake.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol#378-379) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in CardMakerCake.transferToContract (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol):
	External calls:
	- (price,owner) = receiver.doTransfer(msg.sender,bytesToUint(_data)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xe236a4e7662aca9636b04c15290701e14b97c4e6.sol)
